answers.answer: Woot, woot, woot!!!
Jade, Opus.........You Go Girls!!!!I love you both!!  :-)
Thank you, both!  It's an honor to be asked and I plan on doing my very best!

Hi and Welcome !  You probably don't remember me, as I haven't posted in some time.   I am on another feline diabetes message board working hard to hopefully get my diabetic kitty into remission.  I do log on every day reading.  The forum is lucky to have you both.Hi Pretty Kitty, too.
I just this minute found out!  This is great!  MH couldn't have chosen two better people for this honor. Congratulations to both of you!  Let's party!  ♥ Love you both ♥

Thank you so much everyone for all the encouraging words, I hope we both can always be of some help. Keeping our babies healthy and always learning from each and every situation.Maddie6, Hi, please come on anytime and share what you've learned about feline diabetes...we'd all be interested in keeping tabs on kitty.Everyone of you are full of valuable information and are so good about posting, sharing, encouraging and giving hugs when we need them the most.This is one great group!!!
congrats and yay! Good for you both!! I have to say I have learned and been helped by this group several times and check in once a day-love it! Spirit, Butters and Bob say "meow'!!

So well put as always, Opus.  This forum wouldn't be what it is without Everyone's knowledge and constant input.  I've learned so much in the year and a half I've been here as well as have made some wonderful friends.  Of course I remember you, Maddie6.  Nice to see you!Thanks again to everyone!!!  ((((((Group Hug))))))...♥

Maddie6!!!! :-)   Hi there hon!!! Of course I remember you.And hey, please, now that you are into feline diabetes so much it would be great if you could share what you already know with us. The more info the better.A'right......Linda,,,,where the party at? LOL

Thank you Opus and Pretty Kitty.  That's so nice to be welcomed back.  I didn't intend on leaving but got so involved with Maggie's care.  Hey, PK I've been trying to keep up with your pregnancy.  It won't be long, right!  Maggie is doing great.   I'll write more on another thread about her diabetes and what I've learned.
Mississippi, PK......see I'm closer than you thought ;)
Maddie,aww...thank you. Yes I am close. My baby shower is tomorrow, Sunday. I'll be 34 weeks tomorrow and IT'S A BOY!!! he-hehLinda,I'm bringing the cats, BBQ chicken and beer. We need a DJ!!!!!

We can just give the kitties a mike and let them howl it out..for entertainment.  You know we've always wanted to get them all together in the same room, lol.  Seriously, we do need a DJ.  Maybe Pip would come and be our DJ!
Perfect choices!

PK....may you get tons of beautiful gifts for that Noah and perhaps a soccer ball too. can't wait to see his handsome smile!!Nancy, Linda and Spirit I appreciate the kind words....My boys 'love' BBQ chicken, long way from Canada to Mississippi tho...we better start today. lol..........wouldn't that be such fun.Nancy how's GHM?...would love to meet him too.
Congrats girls,you both deserve it .Using a comp where I could not login to post here many times

Thank you Spirit, Nancy and AppleBr!!!  We are Nothing without you guys!  I am having major PC problems.   Tried to defrag, but that's taking too long.  Going to transfer some info onto a flash drive and see if that frees up some space.  Wish me luck - hope to see you all tomorrow!Love to all...♥
Congratulations Opus and Jade! I know you will do an awesome job here on the Cat forum as you've already have been doing for some time. :)We're lucky to have you! God bless you guys!
Snickers is pleased as punch that you 2 are the CL's!!!
Aw...thanks Snickers and Sara.  Takes a village.  So glad to be a part of it :)

question: Please welcome Jade59 and Opuss88 as your new Co-Community Leader for Cats!  Both Jade and Opus have a lot of knowledge and experience as it relates to cats and have been long-time members of your community.  We hope that your entire community will continue to grow with Jade59 and Opus88 as your Co-CL's!Best,CherylMH Community Mgr
title: Introducing Jade59 & Opus88 as your new Co-Leaders!
